title: Fate is the Hunter replacement file
description:
If you are downloading Fate is the Hunter and you hang at 99.9%, this is the file you need.  You can terminate the download at 99.9 and replace the file VTS_01_1.VOB with this one and you will be complete and ready to burn to DVD.

The file is fine but I think the hash on the original file is bad.  I&#039;m trying to correct but in the meantime you can use this new file.

gdmii
